input.sentences: our tour of the city began at the city square .
pop culture references dotted the city .
but we also came across historically interesting buildings .
the main city church took our breath away | even my atheist cousin .
our final stop was | appropriately enough | the old cemetery .
output.sentences: The historical square of the city was where we began our tour.
Took this great shot of a country music legend immortalized as a piece of pop art, next to an urn and a white fence.
The center of town had some great historical, brick buildings.
My cousin and I went inside a lovely church with beautiful stained glass windows.
We finished the day by visiting a very old and pictaresque cemetary.
